name: collect_shelter_materials_fast
goal: Collect enough wood quickly to enable immediate shelter construction

steps.title: Find Dense Tree Cluster
steps.details: Locate an area with multiple oak trees to minimize movement overhead.

steps.title: Mine Logs
steps.details: Gather at least 24 oak logs to support planks, door, and emergency scaffolding.

steps.title: Convert to Build-Ready Materials
steps.details: Craft logs into planks and ensure at least one crafting table is available.
